chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
~ (exists x y z t : Z, 0 < x /\ 0 < y /\ 0 < z /\ 0 < t /\ Z.add (Z.mul x x) (Z.mul y y) = Z.mul z z /\ Z.mul x y = Z.mul 2 (Z.mul t t))

Premises:

Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
N.add = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => m | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => n | N.pos q => N.pos (p + q) end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.add (_ _)%N_scope
N.mul = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos q => N.pos (p * q) end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.mul (_ _)%N_scope

domain_P1 : forall X : R -> Prop, ~ (exists y : R, X y) \/ (exists y : R, X y /\ (forall x : R, X x -> x = y)) \/ (exists x y : R, X x /\ X y /\ x <> y)
OMEGA5 : forall x y z : Z, x = 0 -> y = 0 -> x + y * z = 0
OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, 0 <= x -> y = 0 -> 0 <= x + y * z
Rsepare : forall x y : R, x <> y -> exists V W : R -> Prop, neighbourhood V x /\ neighbourhood W y /\ ~ (exists y0 : R, intersection_domain V W y0)

OMEGA17 : forall x y z : Z, Zne x 0 -> y = 0 -> Zne (x + y * z) 0
Z.divide = fun x y : Z => exists z : Z, y = z * x : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.divide (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.abs_wd = fun (x y : Z) (EQ : x = y) => let o : 0 <= x \/ x <= 0 := Z.le_ge_cases 0 x in match o with | or_introl H => (fun lemma : Z.abs x = x => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.Equivalence_Transitive (Z.abs x) x lemma (Z.abs y) (Z.abs y) (Morphisms.eq_proper_proxy (Z.abs y))) (Z.abs_eq x H) ((fun lemma : Z.abs y = y => Morphisms.trans_sym_co_inv_impl_morphism (RelationClasses.Equivalence_PER Z.eq_equiv) (Z.abs y) y lemma) (Z.abs_eq y ((fun lemma : x = y => Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism (Morphisms.subrelation_proper Z.le_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.sub...
intersection_vide_in = fun (D : R -> Prop) (f0 : family) => forall x : R, (ind f0 x -> included (f0 x) D) /\ ~ (exists y : R, intersection_family f0 y) : (R -> Prop) -> family -> Prop Arguments intersection_vide_in _%function_scope
multiple4_2 : forall u v : Z, Zodd v -> Zodd u -> v <= u -> rel_prime u v -> 1 < u -> 1 < v -> exists two : Z * Z, let (s, w) := two in (u - v = 4 * s /\ u + v = 2 * w \/ u - v = 2 * w /\ u + v = 4 * s) /\ 0 < s /\ 0 < w /\ rel_prime s w
sqr_poss : forall z : Z, 0 < z * z -> z <> 0
Z.sgn_wd = fun (x y : Z) (Hxy : x = y) => let o : 0 < x \/ 0 = x \/ x < 0 := Z.lt_trichotomy 0 x in match o with | or_introl LT => (fun lemma : Z.sgn x = 1 => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.Equivalence_Transitive (Z.sgn x) 1 lemma (Z.sgn y) (Z.sgn y) (Morphisms.eq_proper_proxy (Z.sgn y))) (Z.sgn_pos x LT) ((fun lemma : Z.sgn y = 1 => Morphisms.trans_sym_co_inv_impl_morphism (RelationClasses.Equivalence_PER Z.eq_equiv) (Z.sgn y) 1 lemma) (Z.sgn_pos y ((fun lemma : x = y => Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism (Morphisms.subrelation_proper Z.lt_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (M...

OMEGA3 : forall x y k : Z, k > 0 -> x = y * k -> x = 0 -> y = 0
OMEGA18 : forall x y k : Z, x = y * k -> Zne x 0 -> Zne y 0
OMEGA2 : forall x y : Z, 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x + y
Zr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list Z) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe2
is_sqr = fun n : Z => 0 <= n /\ (exists i : Z, i * i = n /\ 0 <= i) : Z -> Prop Arguments is_sqr _%Z_scope
for_exists_ab : forall u v m n : Z, v <= u -> u * u = m * m + n * n -> v * v = n * n - m * m -> 1 < u -> 1 < v -> Zodd v -> Zodd u -> rel_prime u v -> exists two : Z * Z, let (a, b) := two in (u - v = 4 * (a * a) /\ u + v = 2 * (b * b) \/ u - v = 2 * (b * b) /\ u + v = 4 * (a * a)) /\ 0 < a /\ 0 < b
new_var : forall x : Z, exists y : Z, x = y
rel_prime_sym : forall x y : Z, rel_prime x y -> rel_prime y x
Zmult_eq_reg_l : forall z z1 z2 : Z, z * z1 = z * z2 -> z <> 0 -> z1 = z2

Z.mul_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.mul : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq)) Z.mul
Z.testbit_spec : forall a n : Z, 0 <= n -> exists l h : Z, 0 <= l < 2 ^ n /\ a = l + (Z.b2z (Z.testbit a n) + 2 * h) * 2 ^ n
pytha_set = fun a b c : Z => exists p q m : Z, (a = m * (q * q - p * p) /\ b = 2 * m * (p * q) \/ a = 2 * m * (p * q) /\ b = m * (q * q - p * p)) /\ c = m * (p * p + q * q) /\ m >= 0 /\ cond_pq p q : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments pytha_set (_ _ _)%Z_scope
pytha_set_even = fun a b c : Z => exists p q m : Z, a = m * (q * q - p * p) /\ b = 2 * m * (p * q) /\ c = m * (p * p + q * q) /\ m >= 0 /\ cond_pq p q : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments pytha_set_even (_ _ _)%Z_scope
Zne = fun x y : Z => x <> y : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Zne (_ _)%Z_scope
